roleset.name: cause to have barbs
roleset.note: BARB-V NOTES: Frames file for 'barb' based on sentences in wsj. no Verbnet entry. (from barb.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: almost always adjectival
example.text: The company claims a 40% share of the U.S. field fence business, a 35% share of poultry netting sales and a 30% share of barbed wire sales.
